channel.title: Stranger Foods
channel.description: A catalogue of recipes Tom has made.

item.title: Beef braised in beer
item.description:
Beef braised in beer



Hearty slow cooked casserole for cold days. Beef braising or stewing cubes cooked with root vegetables and stout topped with herby dumplings.

item.title: Spiced butternut mash with pancake omelettes
item.description: Spiced butternut mash with pancake omelettes

item.title: Mediterranean style fried rice with anchovy dressing
item.description:
Mediterranean style fried rice with anchovy dressing



This Mediterranean take on fried rice has all the crispy and salty bits as well as the very best bit: the crispy 'tahdig' layer at the bottom of the pan. 'Tahdig' is the Persian word referring to the bottom of the pot, where the rice forms a crunchy golden layer of crispy decadence. Also called 'socarrat' in Spain, this scorched rice is the part we look forward to the most.

item.title: The big bosh! burger
item.description:
The big bosh! burger



We do love a good burger, and creating a big meaty tasting burger was high up on our list of priorities. This one gets its richness from sweet potatoes, black beans and a whole host of herbs.

item.title: Speedy lamb naans
item.description:
Speedy lamb naans



These speedy lamb naans with lamb mince are an ideal quick supper dish that uses only five ingredients - lamb mince, sun-dried tomatoes, baby spinach leaves, plain naan bread, mozzerella cheese and some store cupboard ingredients.
